ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestModule.label: Default test module
TestModule.description: This is the default test module

TestAssertion.label: MyCondition

TestStep.label: label
TestStep.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'AbstractDQ_Element' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'nameOfMeasure' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a minimum cardinality of 1 and a maximum cardinality of 1

TestStep.label: label
TestStep.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'AbstractDQ_Element' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'nameOfMeasure' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should not be empty if it's present
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $rid := $record//*[local-name()='fileIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*/text() let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='AbstractDQ_Element' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='nameOfMeasure' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if ($propertyFound[(count(*)=0 and not(text())) or (count(child::*)=1 and ((child::*[data(@codeList) and not(data(@codeListValue))]) or (child::*[local-name()='CharacterString' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' and not(text())])))]) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'nameOfMeasure', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'fileIdentifier': $rid, 'filename': local:filename($record) }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestStep.label: label
TestStep.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The type with localName 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' must contain one and only one of the following options:
  • features
  • attributeInstances
  • dataset
  • other
